statements: SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT username, loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE interest_rate < 3.5;
SELECT user_id, loan_duration FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT user_id, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'rejected';
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_duration >= 12;
SELECT username, interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT user_id, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount < 10000;
SELECT user_id, username, loan_amount, status FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE interest_rate <= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_duration < 6;
SELECT user_id, loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved' AND loan_duration >= 6;
SELECT username, interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount > 8000 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE interest_rate < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'pending' OR status = 'rejected';
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_duration > 6 AND interest_rate < 4.0;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT user_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 3.0 AND 5.0;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_duration > 12 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT user_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loans FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status IN ('approved', 'rejected');
SELECT user_id, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT username, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT user_id, loan_duration FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE interest_rate < 4.0 AND status != 'rejected';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT username) AS unique_usernames FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform;
SELECT user_id, email, status FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_duration > 6 AND status != 'pending';
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY interest_rate ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, MIN(loan_duration) AS min_loan_duration FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT user_id, email, loan_duration FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'rejected' ORDER BY loan_duration DESC;
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount, MIN(interest_rate) AS min_interest_rate FROM peer_to_peer_lending_platform WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrowed_amount FROM borrowers;
SELECT lender_name FROM lenders;
SELECT * FROM lenders;
SELECT lender_id, lender_name FROM lenders;
SELECT available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrowed_amount > 1000;
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders WHERE available_funds >= 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders WHERE lender_name LIKE '%o';
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrowed_amount DESC;
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders ORDER BY available_funds ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers LIMIT 5;
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders LIMIT 10;
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(borrowed_amount) AS total_borrowed_amount FROM borrowers GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT lender_name, AVG(available_funds) AS average_funds FROM lenders GROUP BY lender_name;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers UNION SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers INTERSECT SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers EXCEPT SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE borrowed_amount > 1000;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrowed_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders WHERE available_funds >= 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount, lender_name, available_funds FROM borrowers JOIN lenders ON borrowed_amount < available_funds;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_borrowers FROM borrowers;
SELECT AVG(borrowed_amount) AS avg_borrowed_amount FROM borrowers;
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_name FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(borrowed_amount) AS total_borrowed_amount FROM borrowers GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT MAX(borrowed_amount) AS max_borrowed_amount FROM borrowers;
SELECT lender_name, MIN(available_funds) AS min_available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, lender_name, borrowed_amount, available_funds FROM borrowers CROSS JOIN lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrowed_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5;
SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders WHERE lender_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers UNION SELECT lender_name, available_funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT lender_name, COALESCE(available_funds, 0) AS funds FROM lenders;
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrowed_amount < (SELECT AVG(borrowed_amount) FROM borrowers);
SELECT borrower_name, borrowed_amount FROM borrowers WHERE borrowed_amount = (SELECT MAX(borrowed_amount) FROM borrowers);
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(borrowed_amount) AS total_borrowed_amount FROM borrowers HAVING total_borrowed_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT username, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT loan_id, user_id FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT loan_amount, loan_date FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, loan_id, borrower_id, lender_id FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions;
SELECT u.username, l.loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.borrower_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, l.loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON t.loan_id = l.loan_id;

SELECT u.username, l.loan_amount, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id;

SELECT u.username AS lender, l.loan_amount, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id AND u.user_id = t.lender_id;

SELECT u.username AS borrower, l.loan_amount, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id AND u.user_id = t.borrower_id;

SELECT u.username AS borrower, l.loan_amount, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id AND u.user_id = t.borrower_id ORDER BY l.loan_amount DESC;

SELECT u.username AS lender, l.loan_amount, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id AND u.user_id = t.lender_id ORDER BY l.loan_amount ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, l.loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, u.username AS borrower, u2.username AS lender FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u ON t.borrower_id = u.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u2 ON t.lender_id = u2.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users;
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans;
SELECT u.user_id, COUNT(l.loan_id) AS total_loans FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u LEFT JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT t.transaction_date, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t GROUP BY t.transaction_date;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u LEFT JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.borrower_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, SUM(l.loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username;

SELECT l.loan_id, u.username AS borrower, u2.username AS lender, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans l JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u2 ON t.lender_id = u2.user_id;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u LEFT JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.lender_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT u.username, AVG(l.loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(l.loan_id) > 1;

SELECT u.username AS lender, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.lender_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT l.loan_id, u.username AS borrower, u2.username AS lender, t.transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_loans l JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_users u2 ON t.lender_id = u2.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date > '2021-06-01';

SELECT u.username, MAX(l.loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_loans l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING max_loan_amount > 5000;

SELECT u.username AS lender, AVG(t.transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM peer_to_peer_lending_users u JOIN peer_to_peer_lending_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.lender_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY avg_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, amount FROM loans WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, amount FROM loans WHERE borrower_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, loan_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM wallets;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM wallets;
SELECT lender_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY lender_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM loans JOIN transactions ON loans.loan_id = transactions.loan_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sender_id) AS unique_senders FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS loan_count FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, l.loan_id, u1.username AS sender, u2.username AS receiver, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN loans l ON t.loan_id = l.loan_id JOIN users u1 ON t.sender_id = u1.user_id JOIN users u2 ON t.receiver_id = u2.user_id;
SELECT w.user_id, w.balance, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM wallets w LEFT JOIN transactions t ON w.user_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(l.loan_id) AS total_loans, SUM(l.amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN loans l ON u.user_id = l.borrower_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT l.loan_id, l.amount, t.sender_id, t.receiver_id FROM loans l JOIN transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id WHERE t.amount > l.amount;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT w.user_id, w.balance, COALESCE(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS total_transaction_amount FROM wallets w LEFT JOIN transactions t ON w.user_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE status = 'pending' AND amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT u.username, w.balance FROM users u INNER JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT u.username, l.amount AS loan_amount, t.amount AS transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN loans l ON u.user_id = l.borrower_id JOIN transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id;
SELECT u.username, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE w.balance < 0;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING transaction_count >= 10;
SELECT u.username, AVG(w.balance) AS avg_balance FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING avg_balance > 500;

SELECT l.loan_id, u.username AS borrower, w.balance AS borrower_balance, t.amount AS transaction_amount FROM loans l JOIN users u ON l.borrower_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id;
SELECT username, email, balance FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id;
SELECT w.user_id, MAX(w.balance) AS max_balance FROM wallets w GROUP BY w.user_id ORDER BY max_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM borrowers;
SELECT lender_name, bank_account FROM lenders;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT borrower_id, lender_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'active';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE borrower_id = 101;
SELECT borrower_name, lender_name, amount FROM borrowers INNER JOIN transactions ON borrowers.borrower_id = transactions.borrower_id;
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM borrowers LEFT JOIN loans ON borrowers.borrower_id = loans.borrower_id;
SELECT lender_name, loan_amount FROM lenders RIGHT JOIN loans ON lenders.lender_id = loans.lender_id;
SELECT borrower_name, lender_name, payment_amount FROM borrowers INNER JOIN payments ON borrowers.borrower_id = payments.borrower_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM borrowers;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) FROM payments WHERE borrower_id = 102;
SELECT DISTINCT lender_id FROM loans;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loans FROM loans;
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(*) AS loan_count FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM borrowers INNER JOIN payments ON borrowers.borrower_id = payments.borrower_id GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lender_name, bank_account FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_name, address FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT lender_name, contact_number FROM lenders WHERE lender_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM borrowers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT borrower_name, address FROM borrowers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT lender_name, bank_account FROM lenders WHERE contact_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE lender_id = 3 AND loan_status = 'pending';
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 5;
SELECT lender_name, contact_number FROM lenders WHERE lender_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 500 AND payment_date > '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE borrower_id = 4 AND lender_id = 2;
SELECT borrower_name, address FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT lender_name, bank_account FROM lenders ORDER BY bank_account DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status IN ('approved', 'disbursed');
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id < 5;
